title: Should I buy both an iPhone 11 and an iPhone 11 Pro in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are a person who is looking for a phone that has very good build quality, has great performance and cameras and has amazing battery life for an affordable price then there is no going wrong with the iPhone 11 but if you want a really good next level battery paired with a beautiful OLED panel and an additional third lense (which is a telephoto) then there is no going wrong with the iPhone 11 Pro or pro max but keep in mind that the pro models are very expensive if you want to know more about the iPhone 11 then checkout my full review on my YouTube channel

If you have the budget for 11 Pro, it suffice…No need for 11 then! As for 2020, speculations about iPhone 12 getting delayed are forming. So meanwhile, you can enjoy the 11 Pro. Also, I don’t think there will be a major design change in iPhone 12 except for the flat sides. And 5G is still an year away for Apple it seems…so you can go for the 11 Pro Model.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Prakash Kumar Parida
